channel.title: Docker on Thaddeus Koenig
channel.description: Recent content in Docker on Thaddeus Koenig

item.title: Secure Web Application Gateway (SWAG) Setup
item.description: Intro# I was a pretty big user of the LinuxServer.io LetsEncrypt container since it integrated all of the things that I wanted to put in front of my applications into a simple-to-setup container with minimal configuration. Unfortunately, the team has had to transition to a different setup due to a trademark request. Due to my own laziness, I didn’t really feel like learning how to use the new system so I ended up doing things the hard way for a couple of years, don’t do what I did.
